profile.title: Profayili ya Mutirhisi
profile.mustLogin: U fanele ku nghena u tiaka leswaku u vona swilungiselelo.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Kombisa ya masungulo ni leyi hundzuluxeriweke
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Kombisa ya masungulo ku ri karhi ku ri ni nhundzuluxo
profile.filterExplicit: Sefa leswi nga fambelaniki ni vana
profile.allowExplicitContent: Pfumelela nkoka lowu nga fambelaniki ni vana
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Tisekoni ku fika loko ku dilediwa hi othomethiki
profile.saveError: Xihoxo: A swi khoni ku hlayisa swilungiselelo
profile.noPrivateKey: A ku na khiyi ya le xihundleni eka xichudeni lexi ku yi humesa.
profile.setBackupPassword: Veka phasiwedi yo khombelela bekhapu ya wena:
profile.backupDownloaded: Bekhapu leyi pfariweke hi phasiwedi yi dawunilodiwile.
profile.exportFailed: Ku humesiwa ka khiyi ku tsandzekile
profile.importSuccess: Khiya ya le xihundleni yi nghenisiwile eka xichudeni lexi.
profile.importFailed: Ku tsandzeka ku nghenisa khiyi (phasiwedi yi hoxekile kumbe fayili yi onhakele).
profile.keysRotated: Vukhiya byintshwa byi vumbiwe ni ku layichiwa ka khiyi ya le henhla.
profile.importKey: Nghenisa bekhapu ya khiyi leyi pfariweke
profile.keyDisclaimer: Khiya ya wena ya le xihundleni a yi suki eka xichudeni lexi. Humesa kopi leyi sirelekiweke hi phasiwedi leswaku u yi vuyisela eka xichudeni xin’wana.
profile.themeFreeNotice: U le ka Free—sebenzisa swin’wana swa Sun/Moon ehansi. Engetela leswaku u pfula tinthimu to tala.
profile.backupTitle: Bekhapu leyi pfariweke & Ku hlanganisa swichudeni
profile.backupDesc: Endla bekhapu leyi pfariweke hi phasiwedi ya tikhiyi ta wena, u tlhela u yi vuyisela eka xichudeni xin’wana leswaku u hlanganisa.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Pfimba loko app yi nga languteri
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ndzi tivisa loko mahungu ya mina ma kapiwile
profile.unfollowFailed: Ku tshika ku landzela ku tsandzekile
profile.followHint: Timintshelo ta vona ti ta humelela eka feed ya Wena ya Lava U va Landzelaka loko va rhumela eka ‘Followers’ kumbe ‘Public’.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Ku humelele nchumu wo hoxeka eka xiyenge lexi.
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Ku rhumela mimbuyelo ya foni/tinsimu emahlweni
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Rhumela mifono ni tinsimu leti nghenaka eka foni kumbe imeyili leyi tiyisekisiweke. Tifono/tinsimu leti humaka ti nga kombisa nomboro ya wena ya Chatforia.
profile.destinationPhoneForCalls: Foni ya le makumu (E.164) ya mifono
profile.quietHoursOptional: Tinhora ta ku miyela (hi ku tihlawulela)

chat.selectPrompt: Hlawula xitiviso kumbe kamara leswaku u sungula ku vulavula

status.maxTooltip: Ku fikela emahlweni ka masiku ya 7
status.filesNote: Ku fikela eka tifayela ta 5. Ku hela ka tiawara ta 24 hi ku andlala.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Nghena u tiaka leswaku u lulamisa swilungiselelo.

premium.heading: Yana eka Premium
premium.description: Pfula switirho swa matimba & susa tisekhwa ta ad.

auth.headline: Miyalezo ya lehandleke, ya misava hinkwayo hi nhundzuluxo wo hatlisa
auth.description: Ku pfala ka makumu (E2E), nhundzuluxo wa AI, mahungu lama nyamalalaka, ni tifono ta rito/vhidiyo.

feature.encryption: Ku sirhelela ka makumu hi ku andlala
feature.disappearing: Mahungu lama nyamalalaka & switiviso swa ku hlayiwa
feature.privacy: Vumunhu ku sungula. Datha ya wena, vukorhoxa bya wena.

auth.desktopTip: Eka desktop? Seina hi foni ya wena leswaku u kuma app.
auth.subhead: Meseji ya le xihundleni, leyi hundzuluxeriweke — hi nkarhi wolowo.
auth.tip: U nga tirhisa Chatforia eka xichudeni xin’wana na xin’wana — kumbe dawuniloda app ya yona.
auth.scanHint: Seina leswaku u dawuniloda app kumbe u vula eka burawuza.

footer.doNotSell: U nga dyondzisi Riinformation ra Mina

press.title: Variporota
press.contact: Loko u ri na swivutiso swa vaparikisiwa, hi tsalela eka press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Loko u ri na swivutiso swa vaparikisiwa, hi tsalela eka press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia i meseji leri sirhelelekeke hi nhundzuluxo wo hatlisa na E2E, ri endleriwe ku olovisa swivuriso swa misava hi vumunhu.
press.assetsText: Malogo, swikandza-screen, ni swifaniso swa xitirhisiwa (swi ta ta ku nga ri khale).

careers.title: Mintirho
careers.intro: Hi ntlawa lowutsongo lowu akiweke meseji ya misava hinkwayo leyi sirhelelekeke. Loko u tsaka hi encryption, ku fikelela, na UX ya kahle, hi ta tsakela ku twa hi wena.
careers.openRoles: Mintirho leyi pfuliwaka: Injiniyara (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Purodaki, Ncedo.
careers.apply: Hi yisa njhani xikombelo: Rhumela CV/ti-link eka jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Hi ta Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia i meseji ya ririmi ro tala, leyi sirhelelekeke hi ku pfala ka makumu, nhundzuluxo wo hatlisa, ni tifoni ta rito/vhidiyo. Ntirho wa hina: ku pfuna vanhu ku hlangana—hi vun’winyi, hi vumunhu, ni le ka tindzimi to hambana.

values.privacy: Vumunhu ku sungula: E2E encryption hi ku andlala.
values.access: Ku fikelela ka munhu un’wana ni un’wana: Hundzuluxo wa tindzimi ta 100+.
values.control: Vulawuri: Mahungu lama nyamalalaka & switiviso swa ku hlayiwa i swa ku tihlawulela.

about.howDescription: Mahungu ma pfaleriwa eka xichudeni xa wena u nga si ma rhumela. Nhundzuluxo, bekhapu, ni ku hlanganisa swichudeni swi kunguhatiwile leswaku server yi vona datha leyi nga tsanelangiki.

advertise.title: Vikela na Chatforia
advertise.description: Fikelela vatirhisi va meseji hi tikhumeleti leti tekeke ndhuma, leti sirhelelekeke eka brand. Hi na tibhanara, sponsorships, ni swiphephana swa hina. Lava nga Premium a va voni tisekhwara.

adsense.withPubId: Hi tirhisa Google AdSense. Loko u lava ku hi kongomisa hi Google Ads, tirhisa publisher ID {{pubId}} u kombela managed placement eka tixinwana leti ka tlhelo. Tisponsorship ta le ka xitarisiso ti kumeka — tirhisa fomo.
adsense.noPubId: Hi tirhisa Google AdSense. Tisponsorship ta le ka xitarisiso ti kumeka — tirhisa fomo laha hansi.

advertise.noPlacements: Ku hava tixinwana leti vekiweke. Engetela eka ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Ku nghena kan’we na kan’we ni nkarhi wo tala eka UI ya xichati
why.brandSafe: Tifomati leti sirhelelekeke eka brand; ku hlayisa ku humelela ko tala
why.sponsoredMoments: ‘Sponsored moments’ (xik. “Start a Chat” modal) swa kumeka
why.deals: Tidili ta le ka xitarisiso kumbe hi AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Ndza nkhensa! Xikombelo xa wena xi le ku fikeni. Hi ta landzelela ku nga ri khale.
form.successToast: Ndza nkhensa! Hi ta tihlanganisa na wena ku nga ri khale.
form.mailtoInfo: Ku pfula muchini wa imeyili leswaku u rhumela Xikombelo…
form.messageLabel: Hi byela hi kampani ya wena
form.messagePlaceholder: Ku kongoma, masiku, KPI, swi rhandza swa tixinwana…

legal.disclaimerStart: Hi ku rhumela, u pfumela eka

upgrade.title: Engetela
upgrade.subtitle: Hlawula phakheji leyi kokaka eka wena: susa tisekhwara hi Plus, kumbe kuma switirho hinkwaswo hi Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Subscription yi ta hela
scheduleBanner.body: U ta tlhelela eka Free hi

free.title: Mahala
free.ctaUnavailable: Cinca ku ya eka Mahala (a swi kumeki)

features.ringtones: Miringo ya rito & mimpfumawulo ya mahungu ya wena

gettingStarted.title: Ku Sungula
gettingStarted.subtitle: U muswa eka Chatforia? Xiletelo lexi xa ku sungula xi ku komba swa nkoka leswaku u kota ku tirhisa hi mindzuku ya mune.

alert.text: Xiletelo lexi xi ta kula hi ku engetela loko hi humesa switirho leswintshwa. Loko ku ri ni lexi kayivaka, hi tivise hi

section1.title: 1) Endla akhawunti ya wena
section1.loginText: hi akhawunti ya wena leyi nga kona.

section2.title: 2) Sungula ku vulavula
section2.item1: Endla DM kumbe Ntlawa u rhumela hungu ro sungula.
section2.item2: Tirhisa nhundzuluxo wo hatlisa ku vulavula hi tindzimi ta 100+.
section2.item3: Loyeta mahungu lama nyamalalaka ni switiviso swa ku hlayiwa eka Profayili → Vumunhu.

section3.title: 3) Yana emahlweni
section3.item1Part2: tluka (Plus = ku nga vi na tisekhwara, Premium = switirho hinkwaswo).
section3.item2Part1: Hlanganisa swichudeni swin’wana u veka bekhapu leyi pfariweke eka

account.q: Ndzi endla njhani kumbe ndzi vuyisela akhawunti ya mina?
account.a: Dawuniloda app kumbe sebenzisa web, tshikelela “Endla akhawunti”, tiyisisa imeyili/foni. Ku vuyisela, tirhisa “U rivalele phasiwedi”.

privacy.q: Xana mahungu ma pfaleriwa ku fika emakumu?
privacy.a: Ina. Mahungu ni tifono swi pfaleriwa ku fika emakumu hi ku andlala. I wena ni muamukeri ntsena lava nga hlayaka.

translate.q: Nhundzuluxo wo hatlisa wu tirha njhani?
translate.a: Vula “Hundzuluxela hi othomethiki” eka Swilungiselelo → Vonkongomelo & Ririmi. Hi hundzuluxela eka xichudeni laha swi kotekaka, hi ku tirhisa ti-API leti sirhelelekeke laha swi lavekaka, hi metadata leyintsongo.

contact.a: Hi tsalela eka support@chatforia.com. Engetela swikandza-screen ni vulelo bya app ya wena.

contact.title: Tivutisa
contact.successMsg: Ndza nkhensa—ntlawa wa hina wu ta hlamula hi imeyili.
contact.errorSend: A swi kotekanga ku rhumela. Hle minyana support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Pholisi leyi yi hlamusela ndlela leyi Chatforia (“hina”) hi hlengeletaka, hi tirhisa, ni ku avelana hi vuxokoxoko loko u tirhisa tipulatifomo ta hina. Hi akela Chatforia ku hunguta datha leyi hi nga yi vonaka.

infoWeCollect.title: Vuxokoxoko lebyi hi hlengeletaka
infoWeCollect.account: Vuxokoxoko bya akhawunti (xik. imeyili/foni) ku endlela no sirhelela akhawunti ya wena.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Vundzheni lebyi pfariweke (mahungu/tifono) byi pfaleriwa ku fika emakumu; a hi byi hlayi.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Tidiyangnostiki/ntirhiso tani hi tixixima, muxaka wa xichudeni, kumbe ti-analytics letintsongo ku antswisa ntshovelo.

howWeUse.title: Hi tirhisa njhani vuxokoxoko
howWeUse.provide: Ku nyika ni ku sirhelela ntirho (auth, ku lemuka spam/ku endla khombo).
howWeUse.improve: Ku antswisa switirho (nga xiharhi nhundzuluxo, ku tshembeka).

sharing.title: Ku avela
sharing.body: A hi xavisi datha ya munhu. Hi nga avela datha leyintsongo na vaprosesa (xik. push, analytics) hi swivumelano leswi tibanaka swinene.

rights.title: Timfanelo ta wena
rights.body: Hi ku ya hi ndhawu ya wena (xik. GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), u nga kombela ku kuma, ku lulamisa, ku sula, kumbe ku hambanisa mimfanelo yin’wana ya ku lunghiseta datha. Tivutisa: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Ku hlayisa datha & vuhlayiseki
retention.body: Hi hlayisa leswi lavekaka ntsena ku tirhisa ntirho, naswona hi tirhisa vuhlayiseki bya ndhavuko. Vundzheni bya E2E a hi byi dyondzi.

children.title: Vana
children.body: Chatforia a yi kongomeli vana lava nga ehansi ka 13 (kumbe ku ya hi nawu wa ndhawu ya wena).

changes.title: Swintshuxo
changes.body: Hi ta veka mphakele laha naswona hi pfuxeta ‘Ku pfuxetiwa ro hetelela’.

contact.title: Tivutisa
contact.body: privacy@chatforia.com • [Vito ra le nawini ra khampani], [Dilesi]

intro.body: Hi ku tirhisa Chatforia u pfumela eka Migaqo leyi. Loko u nga pfumeli, u nga yi tirhisi.

accounts.title: Tihakelo
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Nyika vuxokoxoko lebyi kongomeke u tlhela u sirhelela switifiketi.
accounts.itemResponsibility: U na vutihlamuleri bya leswi humaka eka akhawunti ya wena.

acceptableUse.title: Ku tirhisa kahle
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ku hava leswi nga enawini, ku endla khombo, kumbe leswaku swi lwisana ni nawu; ku hava spam kumbe ku tirhisa maendlelo ya othomethiki yo bihisa.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Hi nga yimisa/hekula loko ku ri na ku tluleriwa.

yourContent.title: Vundzheni bya wena
yourContent.body: U hlayisa timfanelo ta vundzheni bya wena. U hi nyika timfanelo leti lavekaka ku tirhisa ntirho (xik. ku rhumela, ku hlayisa, ku hundzuluxela).

disclaimer.title: Switsarisiso & vutihlamuleri
disclaimer.body: Ntirho wu nyikiwa ‘hi swiyimo leswi nga kona’ handle ka switshembiso. Ku fika laha nawu wu pfumeleka, Chatforia a yi na vutihlamuleri bya milandzu ya hansi-hansi kumbe leyi humaka endzeni ka yona.

changes.title: Swintshuxo
changes.body: Hi nga pfuxeta migaqo leyi; ku ya emahlweni ku tirhisa endzhaku ka swintshuxo swi vula ku pfumela.

contact.title: Tivutisa
contact.body: support@chatforia.com • [Vito ra le nawini ra khampani], [Dilesi]

doNotSell.title: U nga dyondzisi kumbe u nga aveli Vuxokoxoko bya Mina
doNotSell.body: Chatforia a yi dyondzisi vuxokoxoko bya munhu. Vahlawuriwa va California va nga tlhela va endla swikombelo hi ku landzelela CPRA hi buti leri hansi.

cookies.title: Swilungiselelo swa Tikhukisi
cookies.body: Chatforia yi tirhisa tikhukisi letintsongo (xik. seshini, vuhlayiseki). A hi tirhisa tikhukisi ta ad ta va-3. Lawula tikhukisi hi swilungiselelo swa burawuza ra wena.
